name: The Eyeball Museum
description:
Summary:  The protagonist is somehow transported and trapped into another universe. He or she must overcome each room to get back into the real world. The protagonist is forced to interact with objects that create a feeling of confusion and weirdness.

Gameplay:

The player walks around a Museum filled with ceramics. The player must feed them to a monster blocking the way. If the player drops a pot, then the walls of the room float off into the distances with flesh covered hug eyes replacing them and red-light flashing. The eyes stare at you while Guards spawn in and kill you. To complete the room the player must feed all ceramics to the monster.

Developer Notes:

This is a short demo of a game that I made for my independent study. It was my first solo project teaching myself during the development process.

If you like games that are silly and poorly made then this is the game for you!

Keyboard Controls:

Move                

WASD

Sprint                

Shift

Interact/pickup/drop                       

E

Menu                

Tab
